content: TE DRS-D Dust removal system Dust removal system for concrete and masonry drilling with all rotary hammers ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Dust extraction attachments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unique Hilti system for virtually dust-free drilling with SDS Max and SDS Plus rotary hammers Applications Virtually dustless drilling with drill bits of 5-55 mm diameter and unlimited length Virtually dustless drilling with drill bits of 3/16” - 2-1/8” diameter and unlimited length ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Rotary hammer SDS-Max, Rotary hammer SDS-Plus Weight: 0.57 lb.
